summary.body: Could I say a public 'thank you' to David Graves as Chairman of the Barbican Association fo the work he has done on the legal and practical processes around extending our leases. Clearly it's a matter for personal decision but the agreements he has been able to reach and the document now available are most helpful. Many thanks, Pennie
summary.subject: The Guide to Lease Extensions

summary.body: Could the Barbican office supply a new garchey unit, if the one in your flat had been removed by the previous owners?
summary.subject: New Garchey?

summary.body: The AGM is this Thursday in St Giles Church at 19.00.  Please  come along and tell us what you really think. Apart from a Q&A session 2 new pieces of formal business are the new constitution and a new policy on opposing late license applications. So come and have a pop at us in person (though I would far prefer it if you went softly on me!   ) Stephen Horrocks
summary.subject: BA AGM - Thursday 6th May - come and tell us what you think
